# insert(_:)

**Instance Method**

Registers the specified model with the context so it can include the model in the next save operation.

## Declaration

```swift
func insert<T>(_ model: T) where T : PersistentModel
```

## Parameters

- **model**: The model to include in the next save operation.

## Discussion

A model is given a temporary persistent identifier until the first time a context saves it, after which that context assigns a permanent identifier. If you call [doc://com.apple.SwiftData/documentation/SwiftData/ModelContext/rollback()] after inserting a model but before the next save operation, the context discards that model.

## Inserting models

- **insertedModelsArray**: The array of inserted models that the context is yet to persist.
